title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication System
summary: Implement multi-factor authentication to ensure secure and compliant customer login.
description: This epic focuses on creating a secure authentication system that employs multiple verification factors to strengthen login security. It will include password-based access, one-time passwords, hardware or software token options, and session timeout mechanisms. The system will ensure compliance with banking regulations, encrypt all communication during login requests, and maintain detailed authentication logs while ensuring a frictionless user experience.

title: Responsive User Interface Design
summary: Develop a responsive design that ensures consistent experience across desktop, mobile, and tablets.
description: This epic involves developing a modern, user-friendly interface using responsive design techniques. The layout will automatically adjust for different screen sizes and devices, ensuring consistent usability whether accessed via desktop, tablet, or mobile. Accessibility guidelines (WCAG compliance) will be incorporated to make the experience inclusive for all users. Optimization for performance and mobile data efficiency will also be prioritized.

title: Personalized Dashboard and Service Display
summary: Create a dynamic dashboard that provides personalized content based on user profile and eligibility.
description: This epic focuses on developing a personalized customer dashboard that displays relevant banking products, services, and account summaries according to individual profiles and eligibility criteria. It will use real-time data from the bankâ€™s core system to ensure timely and accurate updates, providing an intuitive interface where customers can view their financial standing, recent transactions, available offers, and quick actions.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable customers to initiate account openings and modify banking services digitally.
description: This epic enables end-to-end digital workflows for account opening and service requests. It will include guided form-based processes, automatic field population using customer data, document upload capability, real-time validation, and backend routing for approval. The workflows will reduce manual effort and minimize turnaround times, providing a seamless, branchless experience while maintaining compliance with internal and regulatory policies.

title: Save and Resume Application Functionality
summary: Allow customers to save incomplete forms and applications to resume at a later stage.
description: This epic introduces a mechanism for customers to save partial progress while initiating a new account or service request. Data will be securely stored as a draft, encrypted, and retrievable upon re-login. A clear progress indicator and version tracking will guide users in completing their applications conveniently. Auto-save functionality will ensure no data loss due to session expiration or connection issues.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Enable customers to securely upload supporting documents for verification and service requests.
description: This epic focuses on implementing a secure, encrypted file transfer mechanism, enabling customers to upload and manage identity, address, or financial documents directly within the portal. Files will be stored with strict access controls and validated for format and size. Integration with workflow systems will ensure automatic linking of uploaded documents to corresponding requests for verification and approval processing.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time tracking and automated notifications for customer requests and applications.
description: This epic introduces the ability to monitor and track active service requests and account applications in real time. A tracking interface within the portal will display progress stages such as 'Pending Review', 'In Progress', and 'Completed'. Automated email or SMS notifications will update customers about key changes, approvals, or rejections. This transparency minimizes customer uncertainty and improves satisfaction.

title: Interaction History and Activity Log
summary: Maintain a complete record of all customer activities within the portal for transparency and compliance.
description: This epic establishes an activity logging system that captures and displays all customer interactions, including account requests, updates, document uploads, and profile changes. Customers will have access to a summarized view of their actions, while detailed audit logs will be maintained for compliance and monitoring. The history will also support advanced search and filtering functions for easy retrieval of past interactions.

title: Core Banking System Integration Layer
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking and existing backend systems.
description: This epic will develop the integration layer that connects the self-service portal with the bank's core banking and middleware systems. It will use secure API protocols to synchronize customer data, account balances, product eligibility, and service requests in real time. The integration layer ensures reliable, high-performance data exchange with proper validation, logging, and encryption mechanisms.

title: Independent Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop an independent database architecture to optimize performance and reliability of the portal.
description: This epic involves designing and implementing a high-performance, independent database that powers the self-service portal functions without overloading the core banking system. It will feature efficient data modeling, caching, indexing, and load balancing strategies. The system will be optimized for uptime and scalability, ensuring fast load times, reliable performance, and consistent availability under varying traffic conditions.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Framework
summary: Establish a security model defining access rules based on user profiles and permissions.
description: This epic introduces a role-based access control (RBAC) system that restricts and manages user access according to predefined roles. It ensures that customers, administrators, and support staff interact with the platform only within their authorized capacity. The system will provide configurable access levels, logging of access attempts, and automatic enforcement of security policies to maintain compliance and safeguard sensitive data.
